entry.title: King Of Spice - Greek Seasoning - 700 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: King of Spice
Type: FOOD
Price: 19.99

King Of Spice - Greek Seasoning Jar - 700 g

Pre-made spice blends like King Of Spice - Greek Seasoning create bold and memorable flavors in your dishes while cutting down on preparation time.

Add an extra zesty taste to your appetizers and entrees with this seasoning blend. Its savory combination of herbs and spices will enhance many of your signature dishes. No matter what's on the menu, your customers will love the robust flavor of this Regal herbs and garlic blend.

Versatile Seasoning

Perfect for adding to meat rubs, sauces, and marinades, this blend will add some zest to pizza, baking, tomato-based dishes and soups for Mediterranean, Indian, Asian, Greek, Pakistani, Chinese, Thai, Mexican, Japanese and Italian cuisine. Create a signature Italian dressing by mixing this seasoning blend with vinegar and oil. You can also sprinkle it on pizza for a one-of-a-kind taste.

Saves Prep Time

Dehydrated spices retain many of the same nutritional benefits as fresh spices, while offering versatility and shortened kitchen prep time.

Pre-Blended

This convenient blend will also help to cut down on the amount of individual seasonings used in your recipes.

entry.title: King Of Spice - Jerk Seasoning - 3.3 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: King of Spice
Type: FOOD
Price: 33.99

King Of Spice - Jerk Seasoning - 3.3 Kg - Jar

Pre-made spice blends - Caribbean Jerk Seasoning create bold and memorable flavors in your dishes while cutting down on preparation time.

A savory sensation, this delicate blend of red and black peppers combined with tropical spices such as allspice, cloves, rosemary and thyme rounds out your recipe to give your menu the sweet, hot, tantalizing taste of the islands.
Lightly rub both sides of steaks, hamburgers, chicken, fish, pork, or lamb and grill or pan fry.

Add an extra zesty taste to your appetizers and entrees with this seasoning blend. Its savory combination of granulated garlic, onion, pepper, and spices will enhance many of your signature dishes. No matter what's on the menu, your customers will love the robust flavor of this Regal herbs and garlic blend.

Versatile Seasoning

Perfect for adding to meat rubs, sauces, and marinades, this blend will add some zest to tomato-based dishes and soups for Mediterranean, Indian, Asian, Greek, Pakistani,, Chinese, Thai, Mexican, Japanese and Italian cuisine. Create a signature Italian dressing by mixing this seasoning blend with vinegar and oil. You can also sprinkle it on pizza for a one-of-a-kind taste.

Saves Prep Time

Dehydrated spices retain many of the same nutritional benefits as fresh spices, while offering versatility and shortened kitchen prep time.

Pre-Blended

This convenient blend will also help to cut down on the amount of individual seasonings used in your recipes.

Club House - Lemon And Pepper Seasoning - 825 g

Pre-made spice blends like Club House - Lemon & Pepper Seasoning create bold and memorable flavors in your dishes while cutting down on preparation time.

A blend of lemon peel and ground black pepper. A fresh twist of citrus and pepper for almost any dish.
May be used with fish, chicken, shrimp, scallops, asparagus, broccoli, brussel sprouts and artichokes. Add to melted butter for green beans, squash, corn, noodles, or use as a baste for broiled fish or chicken.
